text.*:
This is a list of flag lists and galleries, most of which are hosted on Wikimedia Commons.

Lists of flags are classified inside the Lists and galleries of flags category.

Contents

  • 1 States or territories
  • 2 Groups or movements
  • 3 Personal standards
  • 4 Historical flags
  • 5 Military flag galleries

    • 6.1 By colors
    • 6.2 By background design
    • 6.3 By emblems
  • 7 External links
